Sentences.sentence: Northern Ireland's peace process would receive a major boost if the Irish Republican Army responds positively to appeals to embrace political methods, a leading figure in the paramilitary group's political wing said Friday.

Northern Ireland's 7-year-old peace accord will eventually work but requires the Irish Republican Army to deliver a "clear and decisive" end to all its activities, Irish Prime Minister Bertie Ahern said Friday.
